page.title: 12INDUSTRY IN PATCHWAY
page.content: In Patchway there are two different industrial areas.{Rolls Royce}make engines.Sixty years ago it was just two sheds and a runway, now they have workshops and an engine testing unit.They also research into new engines.There are two other factories in the same area called{Bensons}and {Watson Bros.}The former is a civil engineering company ,while the latter produces structural steel and platework { Aztec West}owns 168 acres of land near the M4/M5 interchange. It rents out research and development, industrial and warehouse space as well as campus style offices.The tenant companies cover a variety of projects including computers,terminals, submarines cables and components for electronic telephone exchanges and other computer products.
